messages.message: Can anyone help me with a good prompt to extract the transaction history / account activity from a bank statement? I have been struggling with this since yesterday. It either fails miserably or when it extracts it does not extract all transactions. It only lists a few. I have been trying to process this using Build to demo to a potential partner without success. Attached is the bank statement I am using.
@Varun Jain / @vineeth wasnt there a Intern Demo that allowed for different chunking and returning more nodes back from weaviate? May be helpful in this case
CC @Lalit who is working on this exact problem
Yeah, it's not a prompt issue solely, token limits also come into play.

I wonder if we should document the limitations (tables spanning only 3 pages atm).   I've had prospects assuming the whole platform doesnt work based on the experience that it cant extract a 5 page table.
